question: do souls of deceased meet in jannah
answer:
QUESTION
i had asked that do souls (who are related to each other) meet in Jannah? I am not talking about on the Day of Judgement, but now. Will my Uncle meet his Mother in Jannah? ( Both are pious, very religious, and have always been on the path which leads to happiness of Allah). So my question is will do they meet each other? Jazakallah.
ANSWER


Share:

The Jannatis will meet each other in Jannah. (al-Tazkirah pg.424; Cairo) Your uncle will meet his mother in Jannah, Insha Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
